header.title: bbDKP Tooltips Plugin 0.3.7
header.description: This bbDKP plugin provides Tooltips for Warcraft.
header.author-notes: works with bbdkp 1.1.0 or higher 1) Press Install to let Automod copy the files and do the core edits. 2) Then browse to install/installbbtips.php and run the bbTips plugin table installer. Afterwards, delete or rename the install folder.
